attributes.action: Stop the reselling of driving tests
attributes.additional_details: Driving test are not available for the public at affordable prices due to 3rd partie companies individuals and the applications online selling these £62 driving test for £262 for example this is now unaffordable for the learner driver to take their driving test to get a full license. Potentially this stops finding work travelling in general freedom that we have the right of freedom of travel.
attributes.background:
Stop the reselling of Driving tests.

Third-party companies individuals apps and websites are selling the same driving test at extortionate prices sometimes well over £500 averaging around £200 per test.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Review process for booking driving tests and ban the resale at inflated prices 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702760
